controls: Controls: ARROWS - Move | X - Reap Cell | C - Sow Cell | SPACE - Advance Time | Q - Choose Grass | W - Choose Flower | E - Choose Shrub | Z - Undo | Y - Redo

alerts.lost: End Condition Not Met: You Lose!
alerts.no_save: No saved data found in slot
alerts.autosave: Do you want to load from the autosave? (Click Cancel for to clear the autosave)
